name: 4096 Classic Puzzle!
description:
2048 IS TOO EASY FOR YOU? CAN YOU BEAT 4096 GOAL?
The hugely popular 2048 game is now available for 4096 version! Are you the champion of 2048? It's time to challenge your brain with 4096 GOAL!

4096 is one of the best of its kind, pure joy! It's definitely the perfect puzzle game for 2048 lovers. Quite difficult after tile 2048, which makes it so addictive and challenging.

Be motivated and inspired by Gabriele Cirulli, 4096 - the 2048 extended version will keep you relaxed and carefree anywhere, anytime.

Some studies show that playing against yourself and beating your records makes you feel rapture that gives moments of unrepeatable happiness.

Don’t forget to challenge yourself with the CHALLENGES MODE.

You can also compete with your friends in the MULTIPLAYER MODE with real-time.

Your games will automatically be stored on your device, so you don't have to worry about losing your current game!

Just enjoy playing and have fun!

HOW TO PLAY
- Join the numbers and get to the 4096 tile!
- Just simply swipe into 4 directions to move all tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one.
- Your mission is not only to merge numbers to create a bigger one but also to avoid blockade!
- Get to the 4096 tile, and reach your best high score everyday!

4096 CLASSIC PUZZLE! FEATURES:
- Exemplar look and feel to comfort your eyes
- Easy to play
- Challenges mode
- Multiplayer mode
- Game is automatically saved
- Facebook Login to sync progress and see Friends Ranking
- Leaderboards access
- Share your best score with friends via Email, Message, Facebook…
- Keep playing for High-score after collected 4096 tile
- Frequent game improvements based on your feedback
- Remove Ads & Restore In-App service
